Song.title: Be Exalted, O God
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge © 2007 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: A | A | A | A/C# D :||]
Verse 1: [A]When I am afraid,{,} I put my trust in Y[A/C# D]ou In [A]God whose Word I praise,{,} in God I [A]trust [| A/C# D] In the [A]shadow of Your wings,{,} I will hide mys[A/C# D]elf Un[A]til the furious storms have all [A]passed [| A/C# D]
Pre-Chorus: For [F#m]You have kept count{,} of all my wanderings [D2]Put all my tears into Your bottle My [F#m]heart is steadfast So I will [D2 | D2]sing
Chorus: [A]Be exalted, O [E]God Ab[Bm]ove the heavens And [D2]over all the earth [A]Be exalted, O [E/G# | E]God Ab[Bm]ove the heavens And [D]over all, [E]over all the [A | A]earth
Verse 2: Be [A]merciful to me,{,} for You’re my only [A/C# D]hope My [A]refuge and my strength,{,} I cry a[A]loud [| A/C# D] I will [A]cry to God Most High Who fulfills His plans for m[A/C# D]e Your [A]faithfulness extends to the [A]clouds [| A/C# D (to pre-chorus)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 when i am afraid i put my trust in you in god whose word i praise in god i trust in the shadow of your wings i will hide myself until the furious storms have all passed prechorus for you have kept count of all my wanderings put all my tears into your bottle my heart is steadfast so i will sing chorus be exalted o god above the heavens and over all the earth be exalted o god above the heavens and over all over all the earth verse 2 be merciful to me for youre my only hope my refuge and my strength i cry aloud i will cry to god most high who fulfills his plans for me your faithfulness extends to the clouds
